meanings.definition: A biographical film or television program.
meanings.sent1: I watched a biopic about a famous singer last night.
meanings.sent2: The biopic on the life of a historical figure was very informative.
meanings.sent3: The biopic about the scientist had everyone laughing at the actor's crazy hair.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a biopic, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The biopic brought the character to life in a way that books couldn't.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a biographical film or television program.
meanings.sent1: She received an award for her outstanding performance in a biopic movie.
meanings.sent2: The biopic genre has gained popularity in recent years.
meanings.sent3: His biopic-inspired outfit for the party was a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent4: The city streets felt like a biopic set with all the vintage cars around.
meanings.sent5: The biopic soundtrack perfectly captured the essence of the era portrayed.
